recommended_degree: Psikologi, Administrasi Bisnis, Ilmu Komunikasi, Komunikasi, Administrasi (Diploma, Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Assist in planning and executing employee engagement programs
 2. Support end-to-end coordination of employee initiatives, including logistics, attendance tracking, materials preparation, and vendor communication.
 3. Contribute ideas for improving employee engagement, well-being, and company culture
 4. Provide administrative support for program documentation, budgeting, and report preparation.
 5. Manage schedules, internal announcements, email blasts, and follow-up reminders.
 6. Coordinate with cross-functional teams (GA, Corporate Communication, Talent Acquisition, etc.) for joint initiatives.
